meanings.definition: To engrave or carve a design into a surface.
meanings.sent1: She intaglioed her initials onto the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The artist intaglioed a beautiful pattern onto the metal plate.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel intaglioed a tiny acorn into the picnic table.
meanings.sent4: His words intaglioed a lasting impression on her heart.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor intaglioed intricate details into the marble sculpture.

meanings.definition: A design or image that has been engraved or carved into a surface.
meanings.sent1: The intaglioed seal on the document added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The intaglioed coin displayed a portrait of the ancient king.
meanings.sent3: The intaglioed ring sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace featured an intaglioed pendant with a floral motif.
meanings.sent5: The intaglioed gemstone on the crown symbolized royalty and power.
